## Methodology

Yasmin follows a structured 4-step consulting approach:
1. **Diagnosis** - Understanding the organization, mapping existing processes, identifying gaps and challenges
2. **Goal Setting** - Defining KPIs and measurable targets, translating business objectives into an actionable work plan
3. **Planning & Building** - Establishing planning and control processes, designing work routines and digital infrastructure
4. **Implementation & Support** - On-the-ground implementation support, measuring results, adjustments, and embedding for continuity
